verses.verse: But the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> committed<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604> in the accursed thing:<WH2764> for Achan,<WH5912> the son<WH1121> of Carmi,<WH3756> the son<WH1121> of Zabdi,<WH2067> the son<WH1121> of Zerah,<WH2226> of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah,<WH3063> took<WH3947> of<WH4480> the accursed thing:<WH2764> and the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> was kindled<WH2734> against the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And Joshua<WH3091> sent<WH7971> men<WH376> from Jericho<WH4480> <WH3405> to Ai,<WH5857> which<WH834> is beside<WH5973> Beth-aven,<WH1007> on the east side<WH4480> <WH6924> of Bethel,<WH1008> and spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> them, saying,<WH559> Go up<WH5927> and view<WH7270> <WH853> the country.<WH776> And the men<WH376> went up<WH5927> and viewed<WH7270> <WH853> Ai.<WH5857>

And they returned<WH7725> to<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Let not<WH408> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> go up;<WH5927> but let about two<WH505> or<WH176> three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> men<WH376> go up<WH5927> and smite<WH5221> <WH853> Ai;<WH5857> and make not<WH408> <WH853> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> to labor<WH3021> thither;<WH8033> for<WH3588> they<WH1992> are but few.<WH4592>
So there went up<WH5927> thither<WH8033> of<WH4480> the people<WH5971> about three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> men:<WH376> and they fled<WH5127> before<WH6440> the men<WH376> of Ai.<WH5857>

And the men<WH376> of Ai<WH5857> smote<WH5221> of<WH4480> them about thirty<WH7970> and six<WH8337> men:<WH376> for they chased<WH7291> them from before<WH6440> the gate<WH8179> even unto<WH5704> Shebarim,<WH7671> and smote<WH5221> them in the going down:<WH4174> wherefore the hearts<WH3824> of the people<WH5971> melted,<WH4549> and became<WH1961> as water.<WH4325>

And Joshua<WH3091> rent<WH7167> his clothes,<WH8071> and fell<WH5307> to the earth<WH776> upon<WH5921> his face<WH6440> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the LORD<WH3068> until<WH5704> the eventide,<WH6153> he<WH1931> and the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and put<WH5927> dust<WH6083> upon<WH5921> their heads.<WH7218>

And Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> Alas,<WH162> O Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> wherefore<WH4100> hast thou at all brought<WH5674> <WH5674> <WH853> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan,<WH3383> to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Amorites,<WH567> to destroy<WH6> us? would to God<WH3863> we had been content,<WH2974> and dwelt<WH3427> on the other side<WH5676> Jordan!<WH3383>
O <WH994> Lord,<WH136> what<WH4100> shall I say,<WH559> when<WH310> <WH834> Israel<WH3478> turneth<WH2015> their backs<WH6203> before<WH6440> their enemies!<WH341>

For the Canaanites<WH3669> and all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> shall hear<WH8085> of it, and shall environ us round,<WH5437> <WH5921> and cut off<WH3772> <WH853> our name<WH8034> from<WH4480> the earth:<WH776> and what<WH4100> wilt thou do<WH6213> unto thy great<WH1419> name?<WH8034>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> Get thee up;<WH6965> wherefore<WH4100> liest<WH5307> thou<WH859> thus<WH2088> upon<WH5921> thy face?<WH6440>

Israel <WH3478> hath sinned,<WH2398> and they have also<WH1571> transgressed<WH5674> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> which<WH834> I commanded<WH6680> them: for they have even<WH1571> taken<WH3947> of<WH4480> the accursed thing,<WH2764> and have also<WH1571> stolen,<WH1589> and dissembled<WH3584> also,<WH1571> and they have put<WH7760> it even<WH1571> among their own stuff.<WH3627>

Therefore the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> could<WH3201> not<WH3808> stand<WH6965> before<WH6440> their enemies,<WH341> but turned<WH6437> their backs<WH6203> before<WH6440> their enemies,<WH341> because<WH3588> they were<WH1961> accursed:<WH2764> neither<WH3808> will I be<WH1961> with<WH5973> you any more,<WH3254> except<WH518> <WH3808> ye destroy<WH8045> the accursed<WH2764> from among<WH4480> <WH7130> you.

Up, <WH6965> sanctify<WH6942> <WH853> the people,<WH5971> and say,<WH559> Sanctify yourselves<WH6942> against tomorrow:<WH4279> for<WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478> There is an accursed thing<WH2764> in the midst<WH7130> of thee, O Israel:<WH3478> thou canst<WH3201> not<WH3808> stand<WH6965> before<WH6440> thine enemies,<WH341> until<WH5704> ye take away<WH5493> the accursed thing<WH2764> from among<WH4480> <WH7130> you.

In the morning<WH1242> therefore ye shall be brought<WH7126> according to your tribes:<WH7626> and it shall be,<WH1961> that the tribe<WH7626> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> taketh<WH3920> shall come<WH7126> according to the families<WH4940> thereof; and the family<WH4940> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall take<WH3920> shall come<WH7126> by households;<WH1004> and the household<WH1004> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall take<WH3920> shall come<WH7126> man by man.<WH1397>

And it shall be,<WH1961> that he that is taken<WH3920> with the accursed thing<WH2764> shall be burnt<WH8313> with fire,<WH784> he and all<WH3605> that<WH834> he hath: because<WH3588> he hath transgressed<WH5674> <WH853> the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD,<WH3068> and because<WH3588> he hath wrought<WH6213> folly<WH5039> in Israel.<WH3478>
So Joshua<WH3091> rose up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and brought<WH7126> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> by their tribes;<WH7626> and the tribe<WH7626> of Judah<WH3063> was taken: <WH3920>

And he brought<WH7126> <WH853> the family<WH4940> of Judah;<WH3063> and he took<WH3920> <WH853> the family<WH4940> of the Zarhites:<WH2227> and he brought<WH7126> <WH853> the family<WH4940> of the Zarhites<WH2227> man by man;<WH1397> and Zabdi<WH2067> was taken: <WH3920>

And he brought<WH7126> <WH853> his household<WH1004> man by man;<WH1397> and Achan,<WH5912> the son<WH1121> of Carmi,<WH3756> the son<WH1121> of Zabdi,<WH2067> the son<WH1121> of Zerah,<WH2226> of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah,<WH3063> was taken.<WH3920>

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Achan,<WH5912> My son,<WH1121> give,<WH7760> I pray thee,<WH4994> glory<WH3519> to the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> and make<WH5414> confession<WH8426> unto him; and tell<WH5046> me now<WH4994> what<WH4100> thou hast done;<WH6213> hide<WH3582> it not<WH408> from<WH4480> me.

And Achan<WH5912> answered<WH6030> <WH853> Joshua,<WH3091> and said,<WH559> Indeed<WH546> I<WH595> have sinned<WH2398> against the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> and thus<WH2063> and thus<WH2063> have I done: <WH6213>

When I saw<WH7200> among the spoils<WH7998> a<WH259> goodly<WH2896> Babylonish<WH8152> garment,<WH155> and two hundred<WH3967> shekels<WH8255> of silver,<WH3701> and a<WH259> wedge<WH3956> of gold<WH2091> of fifty<WH2572> shekels<WH8255> weight,<WH4948> then I coveted<WH2530> them, and took<WH3947> them; and, behold,<WH2009> they are hid<WH2934> in the earth<WH776> in the midst<WH8432> of my tent,<WH168> and the silver<WH3701> under<WH8478> it.
So Joshua<WH3091> sent<WH7971> messengers,<WH4397> and they ran<WH7323> unto the tent;<WH168> and, behold,<WH2009> it was hid<WH2934> in his tent,<WH168> and the silver<WH3701> under<WH8478> it.

And they took<WH3947> them out of the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> of the tent,<WH168> and brought<WH935> them unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> and unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and laid them out<WH3332> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>

And Joshua,<WH3091> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, took<WH3947> <WH853> Achan<WH5912> the son<WH1121> of Zerah,<WH2226> and the silver,<WH3701> and the garment,<WH155> and the wedge<WH3956> of gold,<WH2091> and his sons,<WH1121> and his daughters,<WH1323> and his oxen,<WH7794> and his asses,<WH2543> and his sheep,<WH6629> and his tent,<WH168> and all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had: and they brought<WH5927> them unto the valley<WH6010> of Achor.<WH5911>

And Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> Why<WH4100> hast thou troubled<WH5916> us? the LORD<WH3068> shall trouble<WH5916> thee this<WH2088> day.<WH3117> And all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> stoned<WH5619> him with stones,<WH68> and burned<WH8313> them with fire,<WH784> after they had stoned<WH7275> them with stones.<WH68>

And they raised<WH6965> over<WH5921> him a great<WH1419> heap<WH1530> of stones<WH68> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117> So the LORD<WH3068> turned<WH7725> from the fierceness<WH4480> <WH2740> of his anger.<WH639> Wherefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the name<WH8034> of that<WH1931> place<WH4725> was called,<WH7121> The valley<WH6010> of Achor,<WH5911> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>
